create_order(address,uint128,uint64,byte.details: Create order to mint vAsset or redeem vAsset on bifrost chain

params.amount: The amount of the asset to mint or redeem
params.assetAddress: The address of the asset to mint or redeem
params.channel_id: The channel id of the order, you can set it. Bifrost chain will use it to share reward.*
params.dest_chain_id: When order is executed on Bifrost, Asset/vAsset will be transferred to this chain
params.receiver: The receiver address on the destination chain, 20 bytes for EVM, 32 bytes for Substrate
params.remark: The remark of the order, less than 32 bytes. For example, "OmniLS"

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

mintVNativeAsset(address,string).notice: Minted vNative assets such as vASTR, vGLMR, vMOVR

mintVNativeAssetWithChannelId(address,st.notice: Minted vNative assets such as vASTR, vGLMR, vMOVR
